backup_creation_dialog_content: The back up will be created in the cloud. The current data in your device will be saved replacing the current back up data. Do you want to proceed?

backup_removal_dialog_content: The back up data will be completely removed from the server and it will be not available anymore. Do you want to proceed?
login_bloc_close_session_successful: Successfully closed your session. You may now close this page.
login_bloc_remove_account_successful: Successfully removed your account and all of your data in the server. You may now close this page.
login_removeAccountDialog_content: Removing your account will remove all your back ups too. Although you will still be able to use the app :)
login_formDisclaimer:
By creating an account or logging in, you gain access to back ups. Back ups will allow you to maintain your current lists and scores across devices. 

Read the dialogs prompted when creating, merging or removing a back up for more information on these operations.

dict_jisho_add_kanji_bottom_sheet_title: Select a KanList to add the word and classify it
coach_tutorial_kanlists_1:
Welcome to KanPractice!

In this app you can create your own vocabulary lists and see your progress in detail as you improve your Japanese through practice and tests.

Here are the vocabulary lists created by you (these are sample vocabulary lists). In a newly created list, you should include the words you want according to a theme defined by you.
coach_tutorial_kanlists_2:
You can tap here in order to view all your lists or folders. You can create folders to group lists for further classification and order in your study.

For example, you might want to store all your lists from the Mina No Nihongo or Genki lessons in one single folder.
coach_tutorial_kanlists_4: Look up words you don't know using the dictionary and add them directly to your lists.
coach_tutorial_kanlists_5:
Add a new list both to the market and to your own lists AND take a test. You can create the lists by lessons of a book, subject, difficulty...

If you want to delete a list, leave it pressed and a dialog will appear to perform this action.
coach_tutorial_kanlists_6: Access to the market, where you can download vocabulary lists that have been created and uploaded by other users.
coach_tutorial_kanlists_7: Finally, the settings where you can view your statistics and change other functions.
coach_tutorial_detail_1:
All the vocabulary in the list is displayed here. You can add more at any time as your study progresses.

Each time you practise in an area (e.g. writing), the vocabulary will be updated showing the percentage of success in that area.
coach_tutorial_detail_2:
Here are the supplementary actions. You can do a Blitz test of this vocabulary list (left), add the list to a certain folder (center) or add more vocabulary to your list when you see it on the street, studying, reading, video games or anime.

When practicing, spatial repetition is used: all the words that you fail to study, will appear again further in the practice.
coach_tutorial_detail_3: Finally, if you click here, you will be able to change the name of the list, in case you have made a mistake or changed your mind about the chosen subject or categorisation.

daily_test_description: Perform a test in which the words will be sorted based on the success of past daily tests. Perform this test daily for better memorization.
daily_test_cannot_go_back: You are performing a daily test. Finish the test, you can do it!
stats_tests_by_type: Total Number of Tests by Type
stats_tests_total_acc: Total Accuracy of Tests by Study Mode
stats_tests_tap_to_specs: Tap on the bars to see more details for each test type
folder_practice_title: Practice with a subset of words of the lists within this folder.
disclaimer_spatial_repetition: The practice is based on learning by fail repetition. This method is applied in such a way that the words you miss during practice, will reappear at the end of the entire review (until you get them right). This stimulates learning and improves vocabulary memorization.
settings_general_kanji_list_description: When active, all KanLists words will show the mean accross all study modes instead of swipping between them
words_by_category: Total Numbers of Words by Category
settings_general_repetition_sub: When enabled the words you fail in a test will reappear at the end for practice. The accuracy will not be updated when practicing. Not applicable in Daily Test.
can_take_a_while_loading: Might take a while, do not close this page.
settings_daily_notification_sub: If active, when you have words to review for that study mode, the daily test prompt will pop up on your home screen.
